game.name: The Dreaded Hut
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A mysterious flood swallows a small village in the Philippines. Wade through the ruined homes, drowned fields, and whispers in the fog to search for your lost sister. Be careful of the water, some things don’t drown… they wake up.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A mysterious flood swallows a small village in the Philippines. Wade through the ruined homes, drowned fields, and whispers in the fog to search for your lost sister. Be careful of the water, some things don’t drown… they wake up.
